title: Singer’s Elliott Urges Judge to Toss Lawsuit by Texas PE Firm
description: Paul Singer’s Elliott Investment Management Inc. asked a judge to dismiss a lawsuit by a Texas private equity firm that claims “tens of millions of dollars” are being withheld after the sale of oil and gas assets.
content: Paul Singer’s Elliott Investment Management Inc. asked a judge to dismiss a lawsuit by a Texas private equity firm that claims “tens of millions of dollars” are being withheld after the sale of oil and gas assets.
